survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Toothbrush Users
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric toothbrushes to understand satisfaction levels, common usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current electric toothbrush?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for smooth user experience.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current electric toothbrush?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently on your electric toothbrush? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture feature usage accurately. Ensure options are clearly distinct.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently on your electric toothbrush? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you replace the brush head of your electric toothbrush?
questions.client_notes: Use clear time intervals to avoid ambiguity. Include an option for non-replacers.

script.question_text: How often do you replace the brush head of your electric toothbrush?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your next electric toothbrush?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 200 characters for brevity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Apply character limit validation.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your next electric toothbrush?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any technical issues with your electric toothbrush?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to filter for follow-up. Ensure clear phrasing.

script.question_text: Did you experience any technical issues with your electric toothbrush?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered as 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up for detailed issue reporting. Limit to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Apply conditional display logic based on Q5.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered as 'Yes'.
